---
title: "Packages Required"
---

```{r, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='hide'}

library(plotly) # Used to create interactive visualizations, making it easy to explore the data dynamically.
library(readr) # Helps read in CSV files quickly and cleanly.
library(DT) # Creates tables to sort and filter data in the HTML report.
library(tidyverse) # Used for data wrangling, manipulation, and general workflow.
library(ggplot2) # Used to create beautiful and customizable static plots.
library(stringr)  # Simplifies string handling and cleaning tasks, like extracting or modifying episode names or labels.
```
